summary: A minimal starter website for Material Girls Quilt Shop featuring a clean, fast-loading template with essential pages and basic content. The design emphasizes the shop’s quilting supplies focus, showcases key imagery, and includes simple navigation and contact functionality.
style_notes: Use a light, airy color palette with muted earth tones to reflect quilting fabrics. Typography: a modern sans-serif for body text and a decorative serif for headings to hint at craft. Responsive layout with large hero image, grid product thumbnails, and easy navigation. Minimal animations (fade-in) for load performance. Icons can be simple line art. Ensure accessibility with proper contrast and alt text for media.
